import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Swal from "sweetalert2"; function BMI() { const [name,setname] = useState('') const [height,setheight] = useState('') const [weight,setweight] = useState('') const calculate = () => { if(name == "") { Swal.fire({ title: "Validation Message", text: "Name is Required*", icon: "wrong" }); } else if(height == "") { Swal.fire({ title: "Validation Message", text: "Height is Required*", icon: "wrong" }); } else if(weight == "") { Swal.fire({ title: "Validation Message", text: "Weight is Required*", icon: "wrong" }); } else { let bmi = (weight / ((height * height) / 10000)).toFixed(2); // Dividing as per the bmi conditions if (bmi < 18.6) result.innerHTML = `Under Weight : ${bmi}`; else if (bmi >= 18.6 && bmi < 24.9) result.innerHTML = `Normal : ${bmi}`; else result.innerHTML = `Over Weight : ${bmi}`; } } return(
